key.name: firejail-enabled
key.description: When enabled, applications will be launched through Firejail sandbox for enhanced security

key.name: sandbox-level
key.description: 0=Basic (Lightweight sandboxing, blocks root privileges, full access maintained), 1=Strict (System call filtering, blocks dangerous operations, maintains network), 2=Paranoid (Complete isolation, private filesystem, no network connectivity)

key.name: app-overrides
key.description: Dictionary mapping application IDs to security levels: 0=Basic, 1=Strict, 2=Paranoid, 99=Bypass (no Firejail)
